website_summaries.verdict: Most kids love roller coasters, and this Creator set tests their skills at building 3 different models from one accessory-packed set.
pros: Lots of intricate pieces and a build that can be structured into 3 different designs tests kids' imagination and creativity
Comes with 4 mini-figures and a helpful instructional booklet
cons: Some sets arrived with bags of parts that weren't numbered, resulting in a time-consuming process of sorting the 923 pieces, some of which have been reported as missing

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased LEGO Creator 3in1 Pirate Roller Coaster 31084 Building Kit (923 Piece) for my grandson in another state for his birthday. There was no problem in shipping. Upon receiving it, my son wrapped it for me. When my grandson opened it on his birthday, he was extremely excited since this LEGO set was #1 on his list. However, disappointment quickly set in as he began building it and found that 4 turning pieces and 3 cart pieces were missing from the set. It wasn't only disappointing to him, but to me as well!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Williams

customer_reviews.title: What is a pirate’s favorite letter?
customer_reviews.text: ‘Arghhh. No, it be the C.’ But seriously though, it’s a lego roller coaster so it’s as much fun as you’d expect. There’s little details like a lego popsicle cart with tiny popsicles. The only issues we’ve had is that the kids don’t actually build it because they are having to much fun building the track and disperse all the other pieces before the set is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Amos

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Lego sets I have purchased for the price. The set is beautifully designed, fun to play with- and can be reconfigured for new adventures. My grandsons - 8 and 10- loved this, and they put it together easily. They took the rest of their other legos to construct a theme park around it. Hours of hands on STEM fun.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lego set, but feel it could have had more pieces to make it better
customer_reviews.text: We love LEGOs in our house and have so many sets. My boys really wanted a roller coaster and so they chose this one. Its a really cool looking coaster them, however the way the pieces of the base holding the roller coaster all the way around , are held is skim to say the least. There are just a few blocks and I would have expected more of a platform all around the roller coaster base to make it look nicer. Problem is because there are only a few pieces, the roller coaster falls apart easily. For the price I feel they could have added more pieces and design to this set.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Very cool Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was ranting and raving about a particular Lego set that was Pirate/Amusement park themed. So I rolled the dice, did my research, and miraculously purchased this correctly for him. His eyes lit up when he opened it, and he immediately began constructing it after eating his birthday cake. I am not sure the specifics on how long it took him to put it together (he is ten) but once completed, my brother sent me pictures of it, and it was very cool looking. My nephew was very proud that he was able to put this whole thing together. Highly recommend, as it is a very neat Lego set!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: No Numbered Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and interesting set that my son tore into and spent hours on, so it bought some peace and quiet for a weekend. The big downfall was that the bags of parts weren't numbered in order to follow the instructions, so he was a little frustrated at needing to sort and organize and take longer to locate each part as it was needed. A little suprising from Lego, but not the first time we've run into that. So this particular set is best for older kids with lots of patience, or a parent willing to sit down and do it together for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal- does not appear new
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with the seal broken. It was advertised as new but the seal/tape on the lego box had been already opened.
customer_reviews.author: sarah scott davis

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVED his new Lego Creator Roller Coaster. This should take him time to put together and he loved that he could make 3 different parts to the Coaster. I know he will enjoy this set and be able to connect it with other sets he owes. Legos are great gifts as they can be used for a life-time! I have a sister who loves helping her son put them together still to this day!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Giese

customer_reviews.title: fun but not the sturdiest
customer_reviews.text: This is all my 6.5-year-old son wanted for Christmas, so we got it for him and, with some help, he put it together the day after Christmas. He really enjoyed it, but he was frustrated because it tends to fall apart a lot--the nature of the design makes it so there's not a ton of support so it's not the sturdiest LEGO product and if he bumped it, something would fall off.
customer_reviews.author: AE2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year-old son LOVES this set! Took him a couple of days to conquer the big coaster (biggest lego project he's ever tried), but he managed and it gave him a huge sense of accomplishment when he finished! He loves the other two rides as well. Very creative projects, especially the catch & release mechanism on the U-shaped ride. My son has played with this every day since Christmas and hasn't gotten tired of it yet (though it did inspire him to ask for another "big" lego project because he liked the challenge).
customer_reviews.author: The Pesky Tenor

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great Lego set. My grandson has been asking for it since Halloween. You really can't go wrong with any Lego set. This came quickly and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy G.

customer_reviews.title: Challenging but rewarding
customer_reviews.text: Our 6-year-old grandson is familiar with LEGO sets and loves to work on them. On this one he concentrated steadily and worked efficiently to build this complex and challenging set all by himself. After completing it he hasn't played directly with it much, but it's still standing in his basement. He runs a track of his N-gauge train next to it so that passengers can get off the train and use the roller coaster. Much fun. The LEGO company is so great!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been a huge hit with our 8 year old! We plan on keeping all of these pieces separately from the rest of his Legos so he can create all three rides in the set.
customer_reviews.author: AJones

customer_reviews.title: Missing lots of pieces
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Legos and was very excited to get this set for Christmas. We've built dozens of larger sets like this over the years with no issues. This set however is a mess. The bags aren't numbered and it's missing several dozens of pieces while having duplicates of others, even special pieces. It was unopened and ordered directly from Amazon, so something seems to have gone wrong at the bagging and sorting part of the factory. I see other people also are complaining about missing pieces. We'll try to contact Lego to sort it out, but so far it's at least 80 pieces missing. Very odd and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wessock

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to assemble and play with
customer_reviews.text: Very cool set with lots of little details that make it even more fun. We bought this for our 6 year old son who is obsessed with Legos. This was a great set for us to assemble together (although my job is pretty much just organizing pieces and "supervising"). We've had this for almost 2 months now and my son still plays with it almost every day. His 18 month old little brother tries playing with it too, and it's still standing, so that's saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Hiznay

customer_reviews.title: Fun !
customer_reviews.text: Super fun ! Don’t get it for your first time LEGO kid. Get it for the ones who do the small boxes with a timer set. It’s a little bit complex but no too bad. Super fun once built my kid likes that the coaster car flips the “water” up I like the swinging skeleton head and the octopus.
customer_reviews.author: AmyK

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good one
customer_reviews.text: This was one of our favorite LEGO sets to date. My sone brought it to his room and played with it for a month before I found it in the LEGO cemetery (Tupperware). This was fun to build and had great playability after it was constructed.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Fun set to build
customer_reviews.text: This is a reasonable price set that is both fun to build and play. You also get to decide which of 3 configurations to build to the point where you might want to get three sets and build one of each configuration to outfit your lego amusement park.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Lego creator
customer_reviews.text: the only thing I didn't like about this is that most Lego packs give you the pack number and which practice start with these you have to kind of guess where to start and which pieces are in separate packs. Much harder to put together than the regular Lego cities
customer_reviews.author: Faith Mom

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: Flimsy pieces, Inferior Quality
customer_reviews.text: The blue pieces holding the tracks in place just keep breaking one after another to the point that my son can't play with it anymore. I first thought it's just those blue flimsy pieces breaking but now the tracks are cracking as well. Note that the first blue piece broke on first use. Then there was more...and more. We have lots of Lego products but only this one seems to have been made with inferior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Handler

customer_reviews.title: Super duper fun to put together and play with!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as an activity for the whole family to participate in during Christmas break. The engineer in the family couldn't wait to start playing with the coaster and track pieces. Fortunately, most of the other stuff could be built while he messed around with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So playable
customer_reviews.text: I love this set because once it is built it can actually be played with. It's not just a display piece. Very creative with pirates and roller coasters. Hours of fun for the kids. Great Lego quality!
customer_reviews.author: kayw

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed the unexpected challenge
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, gave on to a twelve year old and the other a fourteen year old. Both really liked it and reported (in a positive sense) that the construction was a bit more difficult than expected. Plus the three options in one package is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Joey B

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old nephew. He loved it and rebuilt it over and over different ways. He is a Legomaniac and is pretty quick at getting them assembled so these 3-1 are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: OC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lego Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The roller coaster is not too impressive, but my son loves it and it occupied him for days building it. He is 5, by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Austin

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to put together and to play with, totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: With the number of pieces this set provides, the price was very good. There are so many interesting figures such as a pirate ship and an octopus, and the building process was not repetitive or tedious. My first grade son and I enjoyed putting it together and playing with the roller coaster very much. There are 3 variations. We like the first variation so much that we have not taken it apart to build the other two variations.
customer_reviews.author: zimin huang

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong With Legos!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these sets for my grandsons who LOVE their Legos. This is a great value; a much better price on Amazon than on other sites! Nicely packaged with a very short wait on delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Clever Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my grandson who is 6 years old. He loved it and he was able to built himself by following the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Rita E Platten

customer_reviews.title: Mine and my son's favorite Lego set yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I came across this while looking for a different Lego set, and I'm so happy that I did!! My 6 year old and I have had a blast building all of the different scenes together. He's a very good builder for his age, and there a a couple of times he's needed help. I love this set!!!
customer_reviews.author: MKEddle

customer_reviews.title: It is a long build
customer_reviews.text: At 926 pieces this isn't a small Lego Kit to build, the bags are not numbered so I strongly suggest you open one bag at a time and sort into color groups. In all a nice build and an enjoyable experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Davis

customer_reviews.title: No bag sequence, A mess.
customer_reviews.text: This is a 3 in 1 lego set. So the bags have no numbers or any discernible sequence. As a result you have to open all 900+ pieces at the same time. So if you need a piece you need to look through all of those pieces to find it. It makes it a very frustrating task. My daughter did not enjoy it at all. We eventually had to separate the pieces out by color into large trays.
customer_reviews.author: Travel nut

customer_reviews.title: SO. Much. FUN!
customer_reviews.text: 10 yr old lego fanatic was so excited about this set. He built it in about 2-3 hrs, without stopping. Loved every min of it and likes playing with it now that it's set up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Brady

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Totally fun imaginative. Took my 8 year old about 4 hours to build one version of the 3. He loves it so much I'm not sure he'll tear it down to build the other two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Challenging
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson loved it. It was very challenging for him as the bags are not numbered! But he was very successful in completing it.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Faultersack

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Lego set. My son loves building different versions of the coaster and has even mixed it with other Lego roller coaster sets to make his own creations. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Goss

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This was a great gift. Kids and grownups enjoyed putting this together. It’s a fun toy to play with after.
customer_reviews.author: L. chesloff

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Lego set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old son for his Santa gift last year. He really, really wanted the other $400 Lego roller coaster set, but he was not disappointed at all about getting this one instead (and saved Santa some $$). He needed just a little bit of help to build it - but he LOVES it. He's still playing with it and rebuilding it months later. The set has lots of fun details. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had wanted this set for quite some time-so much so that he saved his money and purchased it himself. Kit was easy for him to complete, and he has spent considerable time "playing" with it. Another addition to his "Lego Museum"!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great fun. Took a while for my 5yo to build. That was the point. Kept his attention as there were small completions along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Dad of One

customer_reviews.title: Nice but missing some pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool Lego set with easy to follow instructions. It was missing some pieces but luckily we had some in our spare parts box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the pirate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great LEGO set except for the fact that the pirate killed my family. Just keep an eye on him.
customer_reviews.author: oaktree244

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: These are an incredible buy! Three patterns for the price of one, my grandson absolutely love them
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew (16 yo) took over 5 hours to build the roller coaster. That is something of a record. He usually builds them in less than 3 hours. Of course he had is 3 year-old nephew helping him.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego set
customer_reviews.text: Son get this set for Christmas and was over the moon. He has build both all 3 coster. Was shipped fast and right on time for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun Lego set. My six year old got this for Christmas and has loved putting it together for all three things. He has changed it over and over and still loves to do it. I really love these sets that give you more than just one and done. Very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Interactive and 3 build options
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old loves this set. It’s interactive and there are 3 options to build.
customer_reviews.author: umwolverine02

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves this set. It took him most of a day to put this together, and the cars really move on the track. I like how it's creative and so different than the other sets Lego has out right now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves legos he is only 7 and a winner at constructing legos always buy him age way above . Put this together all by himself quickly wish he would slow down . lol
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: very cool set
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit for Christmas. It is challenging enough for my 9 year old, but also fun to push the roller coaster around once it's built.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen614

customer_reviews.title: Lego's
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was so excited to get this. It came on time and was just what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Barb C

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old loves this set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Lego set. While it was harder for him to build, he has played with it daily for over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hungate

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift for my 10 year old. Easy for him to put together with minimal help, like it so much he'd asked for another one to build a different way so he could have a set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made a 9 year olds Christmas (as well as his dad’s)
customer_reviews.text: Great Lego set and something outside the common Star Wars and other sets. Very fun for all ages
customer_reviews.author: Liz R

customer_reviews.title: Spent too much for incomplete kit!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for hours with my grandson to put this together only to find out some of the essential pieces were missing😤 parts that hold track up (blues), the piece that holds octopus on, and last car assembly😱 totally frustrated!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my 10 year old daughter's birthday present. She loves it. The fact that she can build three different sets from one box is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Fun continues after assembly
customer_reviews.text: My 11yo son loves this set. I usually buy him Star Wars sets but took a chance and bought this one for some color and variety. He not only loved putting it together, but has continued playing with it for days after the initial assembly. It has lots of fun details like a helium balloon cart, a canon, etc. Very unique set!
customer_reviews.author: Maja Kos

customer_reviews.title: Bags are not numbered
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why, but this lego set did not come with numbered bags. We had to open all the bags and my kid made me separate them by color.
customer_reviews.author: TheBearAndMe

customer_reviews.title: Legos Never get old
customer_reviews.text: Legos never get old for my builders. This was a winner. The details of the product keep my older builders interested.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Pribic

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: Kids are getting many hours of play out of this set. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: GHF

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool Lego set, the coaster part runs very smoothly. We have only done one of the three set ups, but would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Missing essential pieces but Lego makes it possible to order replacements. A little disappointing on Christmas morning for my Lego enthusiast. But luckily he is patient.
customer_reviews.author: Halei Haindl-Petris

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. It is one of the most creative sets I’ve ever seen! It is so cute and he can actually play with the roller coaster. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lela Torres

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Gift
customer_reviews.text: If you love Legos. This is a must-have. My kid is 11 years old and has been playing with it nonstop for two days. Invest a couple of hours putting it together, but the outcome is rewarding to see your child in such happy mood. Awesome Gift to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gianini Spirache

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Was a great set to put together. Now my daughter enjoys playing with it and her friends as they use their imaginations to play out their stories.
customer_reviews.author: sdulman

customer_reviews.title: Pirate Roller Coaster
customer_reviews.text: My 7 and 9 year old grandsons loved it........it only took a couple of days to assemble it!
customer_reviews.author: Dee738

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO
customer_reviews.text: My son loved getting this for Christmas. He has had fun putting it together. Seems to have good replay value.
customer_reviews.author: Tikitime

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's a 3 in 1 and that the roller coaster rides really smoothly! --7 year old user :)
customer_reviews.author: Inspired

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LEGOs
customer_reviews.text: Took a few hours to put together, but works great, lots of fun!! My 9 year old is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Dictated directly by my 7 year old: I think that this toy is a very fun toy to play with. One time I played with it for more than 1 hour. The first time I built it I was very excited to finish it. The instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: tbmb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition and with no missing pieces. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal  Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great fun to build
customer_reviews.text: My son is loving building this. He was so excited when he opened it. And he has been working on it all afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Ruddock

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Works, kids love it! Going to display as well as play!
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. It is large so it gave him more of a challenge
customer_reviews.author: NBA318

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old son and husband had a great time working on this, and my son has kept it built and plays with it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Like that you can build it into more than 1 thing.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Pietras-Allison

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: All that matters is my son loved it Christmas morning and is still playing with it . He’s very proud that he built it all by himself
customer_reviews.author: Christie K.

customer_reviews.title: Legos are great for keeping kids occupied and grows their imagination
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 10 year old grandson. He loves Legos and plays with them over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Great for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for our lego-loving 6 year old's birthday. It took us a while to assemble, and was a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: cm101

customer_reviews.title: Grandson lioves putting together LEGOs
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old grandson love this LEGO and had it together in no time
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Brady

customer_reviews.title: Fun piece
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it...he and brother can put these sets together in an hour!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G Mori Jr

customer_reviews.title: Legos capture the imagination of young and more mature builders.
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old grandson started building this kit right away. He had been to various amusement parks and enjoyed roller coasters for small children.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Speedy Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product was a expected, can’t beat Legos! I just wanted to comment on the speed of delivery on the product. Ordered, two days later it arrived. Fantastic 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: LEGO roller coaster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas for my 8 year old grandson, it took him 2 days to put it together but he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A, Hatch

customer_reviews.title: A very good deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 9 year old grandson, he was thrilled to receive it and had a great time putting it together. Everything that we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: The boys loved it! They spent almost 4 hours putting every little piece together. They had so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun to put together. It did take a few hours. My grandson is loving this set.
customer_reviews.author: Rick DeVleeschouwer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun.
customer_reviews.text: We gifted this as a birthday present for our youngest son (7) he absolutely loves it and plays with it with his brothers.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Amidon

customer_reviews.title: B'day surprise
customer_reviews.text: Grandson's b'day present and he was ecstatic. He loves his lego's!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible seller. Kit was incomplete. Tons of pieces missing. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Carter A. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a lot of fun to build and play with after. It’s become a centerpiece of our kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: Catie Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value, shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Great lego box for price! Loved 3 options to build . This was a gift and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne e Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the Legomaniac in my life
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old grandson. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Blair L Consoli

customer_reviews.title: For those kids who like to put things together.
customer_reviews.text: My nine year old got this for Christmas. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Challenge
customer_reviews.text: This Lego set was a good challenge for my 11 year old. It was good to finally have a roller coaster from the Lego people.
customer_reviews.author: David Merrill

customer_reviews.title: It was just what my Grandson wanted. Grandma was s big hit
customer_reviews.text: It was a great product and delivered to my door!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun set with good replay value.
customer_reviews.text: Great set with a large footprint. My 8 year old loved it for Christmas and needed only minimal help.
customer_reviews.author: TorBjørn

customer_reviews.title: Mising parts
customer_reviews.text: too many missing parts made it impossible to build as desniged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my grandson. His party is Sunday. I was so disappointed in the box it came it. The LEGO box itself was damaged and if I would never have picked this particular box off a shelf. If I had time to return it I would but I don’t. Not very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The excitement of the challenge & expression on his face was great joy!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson said looked like a challenge he was going to enjoy! Great pk& delivery. Quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: sheryl Koroleski

product_meta.title: LEGO Creator 3in1 Pirate Roller Coaster 31084 Building Kit (923 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Size:923Hold tight and prepare to scream as you set out on a LEGO Creator 3in1 31084 Pirate Roller Coaster train adventure. This amazing set features a functional roller coaster with pirate-themed props, including a sunken galleon, skull archway, palm tree and an octopus. The working roller coaster train track is shark-themed and the ride’s main drop has a water splash feature and a cannon that fires water elements. Other features include a ticket booth, castle, spinning skull, balloon salesman, a skeleton figure and 4 minifigures ready for the fun of the fairground. The bricks in this set can be rebuilt for further LEGO fairground adventures aboard The Skull Ride or The Ship Ride.
feature_bullets: Build an exciting Pirate Roller Coaster with shark carriages, ticket booth, water drop and decorative pirate-themed props with this creative building set!

This playset includes 4 minifigures, all ready for imaginative play and fairground fun, and a variety of creative building bricks that allow this 3in1 toy to be rebuilt as The Skull Ride or The Ship Ride
923 pieces – Roller coaster playset for boys and girls aged between 9 and 14 and for fans and big kids of all ages
The LEGO Creator 3in1 Pirate Roller Coaster 31084 playset can be built together with all other original LEGO construction sets and LEGO bricks for creative building

Enjoy creative play assembling rails, cars and fun props for The Pirate Roller Coaster toy, which measures over 9-inch (24cm) high, 25-inch (66cm) wide and 12-inch (32cm) deep The Skull Ride measures over 5-inch (14cm) high, 13-inch (34cm) wide and 8-inch (21cm) deep The Ship Ride measures over 9-inch (24cm) high, 21-inch (54cm) long and 6-inch (16cm) deep
